metadata.title: CVE-2023-0179 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was found in the Netfilter subsystem in theLinux Kernel. This issue could allow the leakage of both stack and heapaddresses, and potentially allow Local Privilege Escalation to the rootuser via arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
